INTERSHOP IOM 5.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 27f42750ba6a552ca78a274aa0a4757f51559d71)

Table oms.PaymentDefDO (Enum)

Available payment methods. Some of them may be used only as gouping reference. E.g.: "credit card"

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
description varchar  
name varchar(30) NOT_NULL A friendly name of the payment method or payment group. 
paymentGroupRef integer Id of another PaymentDefDO used as group for the the current PaymentDefDO. 
payment varchar(100) NOT_NULL 1 Localization key. 
paymentName text The name as used for payment method lookup by shops and suppliers when no alias mapping exists. (see [Shop|Supplier]2PaymentDefDO). 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.
